overview.mission: TEEI partners with leading organizations to provide world-class educational opportunities to displaced Ukrainian students.
overview.value_proposition: By partnering with AWS, we can scale our technology education programs to reach 50,000+ students across Europe.
overview.impact: Together, we're building the next generation of tech leaders from refugee communities.

programs.name: Cloud Computing Curriculum
programs.description: Comprehensive AWS training for high school and university students

programs.name: AI/ML Learning Path
programs.description: Hands-on machine learning projects using AWS services

programs.name: Career Pathways Program
programs.description: Job readiness training and AWS certification preparation

call_to_action.headline: Ready to Transform Education Together?
call_to_action.description: Join us in empowering the next generation of technology leaders.
